query:
ALTER TABLE learning_paths 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS titleFr VARCHAR(200) AFTER title,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS subtitleFr VARCHAR(300) AFTER subtitle,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS descriptionFr TEXT AFTER description,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS targetAudienceFr TEXT AFTER targetAudience;
